TEXT.name: parent test 4
TEXT.data_text:
test case:

[[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] 

[[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]]

[[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]] ]]

[[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]]

[[docrep-name: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]]

[[docrep-name: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]]

[[docrep-name: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent: [[docrep-parent:]] ]] ]] ]] ]]

expected: 

1

0

0

0

folder1

 

result: 

first test case gives 1 for folder1 as expected

second test case gives 0 for root as expected 

third test case gave kDoc for "parent test 2"

fourth test case gave kDoc for "tag test cases"

if a doc above root is requested, it cycles around

TEXT.name: sibling test 1
TEXT.data_text:
test case:

[[docrep-sibling-prev: ]]

[[docrep-sibling-next: ]]

[[docrep-sibling-first: ]]

[[docrep-sibling-last: ]]

expected: 

22

27

17

31

result: 

first 3 are as expeceted 

last test failed because I manually deleted a row in the database, sib-last and sib-first will use GetSiblingNext() and loop until it finds the last sibling 

if there is a gap in the siborder, this will not work

[[docrep-sibling-next: 1 | folder1/tag test cases]]

[[docrep-sibling-next: 1 | folder1]]

expected: 

27

36

 

result: 

"docrep-sibling-next: 1 | folder1" should be blank

{% endif %}

{% endif %}

var9 is cats

{% else %}

var9 is false

{% endif %}

expected: 

var7 is true

var8 is TRUE

var9 is cats

result: 

pass

TEXT.name: variable test 2
TEXT.data_text:
test case: 

{{var 4 5 6}}

expected: 

 

result: 

crashes because variable name has spaces in it

note: if you put a variable with space in the database, it will cause the entire page to not load 

right now, this doc has no variables, but if you add "var 4 5 6" in the variables tab, the page will crash on load
